snippet: The Rockies’ Jamie Moyer, 49, failed in his second attempt to become the oldest pitcher to win a major league game.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Colorado Rockies 49-year-old pitcher Jamie Moyer fails in his second attempt to become the oldest pitcher to win a major league game as Rockies lose to San Francisco Giants, 4-2; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: The Rockies’ Jamie Moyer, 49, failed in his second attempt to become the oldest pitcher to win a major league game.

headline.main: Moyer, 49, Loses Again in Duel With a Youngster
headline.print_headline: Moyer, 49, Loses Again In Duel With A Youngster
